    • Uses of Agent in ca.thurn.jgail.algorithm

      Classes in ca.thurn.jgail.algorithm that implement Agent 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  MonteCarloSearch
      An agent which picks actions by running repeated random simulations from the current state and returning the one that had the best average outcome.
      class  NegamaxSearch
      An agent which selects an action via the Negamax search algorithm.
      class  UctSearch
      An agent which selects actions based on the UCT algorithm described in the 2006 paper "Bandit based Monte-Carlo Planning" by Kocsis and Szepesvari.
